mapper.select: SELECT movie_tag.id AS id, movie_tag.name AS name FROM movie_tag LEFT JOIN movie_tag_tags ON movie_tag.id = movie_tag_tags.movie_tag_id WHERE movie_tag_tags.movie_id =#{movieId}
SELECT cinema_spec.id, cinema_spec.name, cinema_spec.description FROM cinema_spec LEFT JOIN movie_spec ON movie_spec.spec_id = cinema_spec.id WHERE movie_spec.movie_id =#{movieId}
SELECT hello_movie.id, hello_movie.code, hello_movie.date FROM hello_movie WHERE hello_movie.movie_id =#{movieId}

SELECT COUNT(movie_comment.id) + COUNT(movie_reply.id) AS comment_count FROM movie_comment LEFT JOIN movie_reply ON movie_comment.id = movie_reply.movie_comment_id AND movie_reply.deleted = 0 WHERE movie_comment.movie_id = #{movieId} AND movie_comment.deleted = 0 GROUP BY movie_comment.movie_id

SELECT -- movie_show_time.movie_id, COUNT(DISTINCT movie_show_time.cinema_id) AS cinema_count FROM movie_show_time WHERE movie_show_time.deleted = 0 AND movie_show_time.movie_id = #{movieId} GROUP BY movie_show_time.movie_id

SELECT -- movie_show_time.movie_id, COUNT(movie_show_time.cinema_id) AS theater_count FROM movie_show_time WHERE movie_show_time.deleted = 0 AND movie_show_time.movie_id = #{movieId} GROUP BY movie_show_time.movie_id

SELECT staff.id AS staff_id, staff.name AS staff_name, staff.cover AS staff_avatar, position.id AS positon_id, position.name AS position_name FROM movie_staff LEFT JOIN staff ON movie_staff.staff_id = staff."id" LEFT JOIN "position" ON movie_staff.position_id = "position"."id" WHERE movie_staff.deleted = 0 AND movie_staff.movie_id = #{movieId}

SELECT DISTINCT movie.id, movie.name, movie.cover, movie.start_date, level.name AS level_name, MIN(movie_show_time.start_time::timestamp) AS show_time FROM movie_show_time LEFT JOIN movie ON movie_show_time.movie_id = movie.id LEFT JOIN level ON movie.level_id = level.id WHERE movie_show_time.deleted = 0 AND movie_show_time.start_time::timestamp >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND movie_show_time.open = TRUE GROUP BY movie.id, movie.name, movie.cover, movie.start_date, level.name ORDER BY MIN(movie_show_time.start_time::timestamp) ASC

SELECT movie.*, level.name AS levelName, COUNT(DISTINCT movie_show_time.id) AS presaleShowTimeCount, MIN(movie_show_time.start_time::timestamp) AS earliestShowTime FROM "movie" LEFT JOIN level ON movie.level_id = level.id LEFT JOIN movie_show_time ON movie.id = movie_show_time.movie_id AND movie_show_time.deleted = 0 AND movie_show_time.open = TRUE AND movie_show_time.start_time::timestamp > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE movie.deleted = 0 AND ( movie.start_date IS NULL OR movie.start_date = '' OR TO_DATE( CASE WHEN movie.start_date LIKE '____-__-__' THEN movie.start_date -- 完整日期 WHEN movie.start_date LIKE '____-__' THEN movie.start_date || '-01' -- 补充日期 WHEN movie.start_date LIKE '____' THEN movie.start_date || '-01-01' -- 补充年月日 ELSE '1900-01-01' -- 默认值 END, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) >= CURRENT_DATE -- 筛选发布日期大于今天 ) GROUP BY movie.id, movie.name, movie.cover, movie.start_date, movie.time, movie.original_name, movie.description, movie.level_id, movie.status, movie.deleted, movie.create_time, movie.update_time, level.name ORDER BY CASE WHEN movie.start_date IS NULL OR movie.start_date = '' THEN 1 -- 如果没有日期数据，排到最后 ELSE 0 -- 有日期数据的排在前面 END, TO_DATE( CASE WHEN movie.start_date LIKE '____-__-__' THEN movie.start_date -- 完整日期 WHEN movie.start_date LIKE '____-__' THEN movie.start_date || '-01' -- 补充日期 WHEN movie.start_date LIKE '____' THEN movie.start_date || '-01-01' -- 补充年月日 ELSE '1900-01-01' -- 默认值 END, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) ASC
SELECT movie.*, level.name AS level_name, level.description AS level_description FROM movie LEFT JOIN level ON movie.level_id = level.id WHERE movie.id = #{id}
SELECT movie_rate.movie_id, round(AVG(rate), 1) AS rate, COUNT(rate) AS total_ratings FROM movie_rate WHERE movie_rate.movie_id = #{id} GROUP BY movie_id

SELECT position.id as position_id, position.name as position_name, staff.id as staff_id, staff.name as staff_name, staff.cover as staff_cover FROM movie_staff LEFT JOIN position ON movie_staff.position_id = position.id LEFT JOIN staff ON movie_staff.staff_id = staff.id WHERE movie_staff.deleted = 0 AND movie_staff.movie_id = #{id}

SELECT DISTINCT character.id as character_id, character.name as character_name, character.cover as character_cover, staff.id as staff_id, staff.name as staff_name FROM movie_version LEFT JOIN movie_version_character mvc ON movie_version.id = mvc.movie_version_id AND mvc.deleted::integer = 0 LEFT JOIN character ON mvc.character_id = character.id LEFT JOIN movie_version_character_staff mvcs ON mvc.movie_version_id = mvcs.movie_version_id AND mvc.character_id = mvcs.character_id AND (mvcs.deleted::integer = 0 OR mvcs.deleted IS NULL) LEFT JOIN staff ON mvcs.staff_id = staff.id WHERE movie_version.movie_id = #{id} AND movie_version.deleted::integer = 0 AND character.id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY character.id, staff.id
